answers.answer: Me! I deff feel that way.. And I gained a lot of weight before I even knew I was pregnant! But no worries my mom and grandmother say that I will prob be even smaller then was before I was pregnant. And I'm like a size 12 I've always had  thighs and breast! I can't wear my reg jeans I've been wearing sweat pants since I found out I was pregnant and I'm 11w5d now. I'm just worried about gestational diabetes and not being able to loose weight after the baby.

My mum always tells me il lose the weight after the baby but im so worried about having a saggy tummy after the babys born. Lol i kno il not worry cus il have my beautiful baby but cant help worrying. Yes im the same, i wear leggings everyday bcus i cant fit into jeans nomore lol im sure we will be fine though :) good luck on ur pregnancy!

I just went dress shopping to find something to wear to my baby shower.. and omg I felt like a cow. I'm 25 weeks and only gained 6 lbs but I look huge. Hopefully I don't get much bigger! I live in yoga pants and tanks. Wish I could just wear pajamas to my shower since it's at my house lol

Lol I think everybody's different! And we will be so busy with our little ones. And our metabolism will get faster. You can always do simple crunches go for walks and try to stay active throughout your pregnancy but I know I've been a cough potato at first but we our supposed to gain our energy levels back soon! But thank you and good luck to both of y'allas well:)
I'm 15+4 and I know this sounds crazy but I feel bigger every single day.

question: 15weeks and 1 day! My belly is defo getting bigger but not like a bump just fat looking! Putting weight on my thighs also! I wasnt ever skinny before i was always a size UK 12 but im so scared to reach a size UK 16! Ahh. And im always gorging on bread and eating anything and everything cus its the only thing that stops me feeling sick and shakey! Anybody else feeling like this?:(
title: 15 weeks and 1 day and hate seeing my body changing and gettinh bigger
